snippet: A pro-business fund that was created by former Presidents Bill Clinton and George W. Bush in the aftermath of Haiti’s devastating earthquake will cease operations at the end of this month.
lead_paragraph: A pro-business fund that was created by former Presidents Bill Clinton and George W. Bush in the aftermath of Haiti’s devastating earthquake will cease operations at the end of this month.

headline.main: Haiti: Fund Created by Clinton and Bush to Close
headline.print_headline: Haiti: Fund Created by Clinton and Bush to Close
